Set against the picturesque backdrop of the Island of Ischia, off the Amalfi Coast, While We Were Here follows a young American writer named Jane (Kate Bosworth) who finds herself at a personal and professional crossroads when she accompanies her husband Leonard (Iddo Goldberg) on a business trip. While escaping the mundane nature of her comfortable marriage by delving deeper into adapting her grandmother's WWII stories into a memoir, she stumbles into a romantic affair with a younger man (Jamie Blackley) who complicates her life even further.
